Posts.Content:
Hi I am 2nd time bc survivor. This time had bc ib same breast. Had bilateral masc. Had trouble healing from masc. Had tran surgery dec 26 3013 and nit healing well again. Have wound vac on belly incision. Breast incisions
opened up. Rt breast has a large 
open area. This breast was radiated in 2005.
Im planning on implants in six months. Im worried that my rt breast will never heal.
Anyone have this problem?
Very frustrated and getting depressed.
Nadia 13
Posts.Title: complications from tram surgery
